title: Follow us on Instagram
description: Follow our Instagram page and like our latest 3 posts
requirements:
1. Follow @earnhub_official
2. Like the latest 3 posts
3. Take a screenshot showing you followed and liked

title: Complete Customer Survey
description: Fill out a short survey about your shopping preferences
requirements:
1. Click the survey link
2. Answer all questions honestly
3. Submit the survey
4. Provide the confirmation code

title: Test Mobile App
description: Download and test our new mobile app for 10 minutes
requirements:
1. Download the app from the link
2. Use it for at least 10 minutes
3. Report any bugs or issues
4. Provide screenshots of your usage

title: Watch Product Video
requirements:
1. Watch the entire video
2. Answer 3 simple questions about the video
3. Provide the completion code shown at the end

title: Data Entry Task
description: Enter 50 product details from images into a spreadsheet
requirements:
1. Download the images
2. Create a spreadsheet with product name, price, and description
3. Enter data for all 50 products
4. Upload the completed spreadsheet

title: Refer a Friend
description: Invite friends to join EarnHub and earn when they complete their first task
requirements:
1. Share your referral link
2. Your friend must sign up using your link
3. They must complete at least one task
4. You both get rewarded!
